Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Quirky \Quirk"y\ (kw[~e]rk"[y^]), a. Full of quirks; tricky; as, a quirky lawyer. [1913 Webster]
quirky adj : informal terms; strikingly unconventional [syn: {far-out}, {kinky}, {offbeat}, {way-out}]
